mapper.select: SELECT a.ORD_NO, a.SEQ, FN_GET_MTR_CD_TO_NM(a.MTR_CD) AS MTR_NM, a.UNIT, a.UNIT_COST, a.ORD_CNT, (a.UNIT_COST * a.ORD_CNT) AS TOT_COST, a.ORD_AMT, a.IN_AMT, a.NOTIN_AMT, TO_CHAR(b.ORD_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ORD_DATE, FN_GET_BAS_DTL_CD_TO_NM(b.COMP_CD) AS COMP_NM, b.CMT FROM MTR_ORD_DTL a, MTR_ORD b WHERE a.ORD_NO = b.ORD_NO AND a.NOTIN_AMT > 0
